https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AhitSVLkQ6T8blWxSFyIzf16fnC.jpg Western culture treats mental disorders primarily through biomedical psychiatry, but filmmakers Phil Borges and Kevin Tomlinson reveal a growing movement of professionals and survivors who are forging alternative treatments that focus on recovery and turning mental “illness” into a positive transformative experience. Crazywise
